title: Multiverse
newUserNFT: 1、Exclusive NFT for New Users, Can Be Claimed Again After 7 Days
inviteNewUser: 2、Invite New Users, Reduce Claim Countdown by 3 Hours
cumulativeInvite: 3、Accumulate 50 Invited New Users, Receive 1 NFT Every Hour
completeInviteTask: 4、Complete Invitation Tasks, Up to 24 NFTs Can Be Claimed
